user_question: What is the average temperature on Mars and generate an artistic image of a Martian landscape?
final_answer: The average temperature on Mars is about -80 degrees Fahrenheit (-62 degrees Celsius). Artistic image of a Martian landscape generated. The atmosphere of Mars is composed mostly of carbon dioxide (95.3%), with nitrogen (2.7%) and argon (1.6%) as the next most abundant gases.
